pr_title: Add AggregatorFactory and tests for aggregators

timeline.message:
Add AggregatorFactory and tests.

Signed-off-by: Bogdan Cristian Drutu <bogdandrutu@gmail.com>

timeline.bodyText: I'm not sure I understand why this is necessary yet, but I bet you have plans. :)
timeline.author: jkwatson
